docs.text: Vultr Docs This repository hosts code samples and support files for Vultr Docs . If you would like to write articles for Vultr Docs, please review these resources: The Request for Article (RFA) list Vultr Docs Program Guidelines Vultr Docs Style Guide
docs.title: About Vultr Docs

docs.text: Vultr's Request for Article List The Request for Article (RFA) list is a topic suggestion guide for Vultr Trusted Authors . If you'd like an RFA assignment, please see the guide to Vultr's Request for Article System . RFA ID RFA Title Type Tags Notes 649337625 How install and use a GUI on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS New Doc Desktop Guides, Ubuntu 647085292 How to Deploy a MERN Application on Ubuntu New Doc Ubuntu An author is assigned. 643432812 Redirect WordPress IP to domain name New Doc WordPress, Nginx 648909225 How to Install and Configure Concourse CI on CentOS 7 Update CentOS 643423386 How to Install OpenMeetings on Ubuntu 20.04 Update Ubuntu An author is assigned. 646022891 How to Install RabbitMQ on CentOS 7 Update CentOS 644027681 How to use Certbot on yum-based LEMP Update CentOS, Security 643416786 Install PostgreSQL On CentOS 7 Update PostgreSQL, CentOS 644036625 Setup 7 Days to Die Server on Ubuntu 14 Update Game Servers, Ubuntu 650267373 Use an SSH Key with Non-root Users Update System Admin
